items.title: Salesforce Solution Architect (REMOTE OPPORTUNITY)
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=1, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=1}
items.content:
Job Description

Salesforce Solution Architect

Zennify is looking for a qualified candidate to join their team as a Salesforce Solutions Architect! This individual will play an integral role in the high satisfaction of Zennify's clients through the design and development of scalable, high-quality Salesforce services and solutions. The Solution architect is responsible for owning the overall design of the technical application as well as recommending best practice solutions based on client business needs. Our projects are with clients ranging from local, small and mid-sized companies to multi-national enterprise corporations, non-profit organizations and state and federal government.

THIS IS A REMOTE POSITION. Zennify is headquartered in Boise, ID with another office located in Sacramento, CA. Working remote, candidates need to be prepared for up to 30% travel to office and client locations.

Primary Responsibilities

  • Participates in, and facilitates as needed, customer requirements and solution design workshops
  • Captures and maps business requirements to system/technical requirements and identifies gaps
  • Assess and make recommendations on processes, designs, operations, and testing
  • Understands the technical depth of the project and validates the correct resources for the project
  • Recommends alternate approaches, analyze impacts, and provide sizing estimates
  • Participates in design and code reviews
  • Analyzes and mitigates bugs and issues
  • Provides release planning and deployment
  • Designs, develops, tests and documents scalable, high-quality business solutions to be built on the Salesforce platform
  • Conducts unit, integration, and performance testing and work closely with users for user acceptance testing
  • Supports pre-sales engagements, estimates, solution design and can articulate what requirements have change pre and post BPR
  • Writes technical specifications (for custom development, system integration, etc.) jointly with the developer team
  • Documents build plans and delegates work to developers and system administrators
  • Works closely with our clients to assess their current architecture and architect solutions that meet their current needs
  • Articulates the value of recommended solutions and approach to customer

Preferred Qualifications

  • 3+ years Salesforce Consultant experience in a client facing role
  • 3+ years developing custom Salesforce applications
  • 3+ years of Salesforce experience in CRM system integration environments with large, complex third-part solutions
  • Experience managing project team relevant to the delivery of the technical solution
  • Experience in enterprise-level projects using Agile software development methodologies throughout the whole life cycle
  • Has familiarity and first-hand experience with third party solutions that support vertical objectives
  • Ability to lead technical requirements gathering & solution design sessions with clients
  • Superior Salesforce development and design skills including: Apex, Visualforce, Process Builder and other standard and advanced Salesforce automation tools
  • Understands of all aspects of Salesforce current and future release functionality including Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Marketing Cloud and Communities
  • Experience deploying web-based and enterprise systems using industry standard environments including REST, APIs, SQL, JavaScript, and HTML
  • Understands testing and release processes

Qualities of the Ideal Candidate

  • Thrives in a team-based, high energy and fast-paced environment
  • Service-oriented and innately driven to produce outstanding customer satisfaction and results
  • Enjoys discovering, learning about and implementing new technologies
  • Analytical and able to logically and methodically work through problems
  • Strong aptitude for prioritization and multi-tasking in a deadline-driven environment
  • Possess a sense of urgency with strong organizational and follow-up skills
  • Demonstrates the following leadership skills:
    • Sets deadlines for project team members
    • Assigns responsibilities and directs work of project team members
    • Mentor, train and guide team members
    • Monitors progress
    • Coaches and mentors
    • Escalates when necessary
    • Analyzes/Identifies areas of risk and develops plans to minimize risk
  • Ability to meet travel requirements, when applicable (up to 25% travel projected)

About Us

At Zennify, we know how to focus, build and balance. We know systems and can untangle even the most complex of technical messes to ensure everything is running in sync. Our expertise in the Salesforce suite of products has helped bring balance to hundreds of clients. We evaluate existing technologies, recommend unique cloud-based solutions and expertly build solutions. We take into account our clients' specific needs as well as their existing infrastructure to develop context laden, elegant solutions. Simply put, Zennify brings competing interests, incompatible systems and seemingly unlinked challenges into alignment to develop technology solutions that drive businesses forward.

Our team is comprised of gritty, passionate problem-solvers. We have the vision to create lasting, long-term solutions for our clients. Because we view our clients as partners, we're deeply invested in our work and the success of our projects. At Zennify, innovation is in our every breath. We're motivated to increase efficiencies and ultimately help the bottom line of our client's business. We dig deep. Zennify works hard to understand the needs of our clients and align those needs with working, effective solutions.

Company DescriptionAt Zennify, we know how to focus, build and balance. We know systems and can untangle even the most complex of technical messes to ensure everything is running in sync. Our expertise in the Salesforce suite of products has helped bring balance to hundreds of clients. We evaluate existing technologies, recommend unique cloud-based solutions and expertly build solutions. We take into account our clients' specific needs as well as their existing infrastructure to develop context laden, elegant solutions. Simply put, Zennify brings competing interests, incompatible systems and seemingly unlinked challenges into alignment to develop technology solutions that drive businesses forward.

Our team is comprised of gritty, passionate problem-solvers. We have the vision to create lasting, long-term solutions for our clients. Because we view our clients as partners, we're deeply invested in our work and the success of our projects. At Zennify, innovation is in our every breath. We're motivated to increase efficiencies and ultimately help the bottom line of our client's business. We dig deep. Zennify works hard to understand the needs of our clients and align those needs with working, effective solutions.

items.title: Enterprise Solution Architect - Remote/Virtual Job
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=6, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=0}
items.content:
Enterprise Solution Architect - Remote/Virtual (Job Number:438746) Description: SAIC is hiring an Enterprise Solution Architect - Remote/Virtual The SAIC IT Market Segment currently has an opening for a new role. The Enterprise Solution Architect will serve as the technical sales lead; championing the sale of innovative, differentiating solutions. - The successful candidate will be an enthusiastic leader experienced in technical sales engagement with the ability to architect and communicate comprehensive, innovative, complex solutions. - You will take an active -hands-on- role with all aspects of growing the IT business. - The successful candidate will have solutioned and delivered complex software solutions, have a mature understanding of modern software development and delivery models and up-to-date experience with leading software trends and technologies. - Key focus areas include, Agile SDLC-s, DevOps and software delivery pipelines, application modernization (e.g. Microservices), and Open Source tool-sets. - You will bring technical leadership in high visibility, strategic IT capture/proposal efforts and be responsible for supporting the entirety of the sales lifecycle including client engagements, representation of SAIC-s IT capabilities at public events, leading or reviewing key and strategic technical solution development to include the approach, architecture, analyses, technologies, cost, and BOE development. - Solutions will span multiple IT competency areas inclusive of software development, cloud technologies, cyber security, data analytics, end- user services, and infrastructure solutions requiring you to have a mature understanding of the SAIC capabilities within each of these domains and a visionary approach to their implementation. - You will be a team leader setting the example of team engagement and professionalism while providing both guidance and support to more junior solution architects. LOCATION: - This position ideally will be located in our Reston, VA facility preferably (with a partial telecommute arrangement) but can be located anywhere in the U.S. as a Telework opportunity. Qualifications: REQUIRED EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE: - Bachelor-s Degree required and 20+ years of relevant experience. - A minimum of 15 years of successfully performing in a role of major responsibility tied to large projects with tight deadlines. - A minimum of 10 years of professional experience as a Software/Systems Engineer or Solution Architect. - A minimum of 5 years of experience with Agile and 3 years with DevOps toolchain automation. - Advanced degree or industry recognized certifications such as PMP, CSM, SAFe, CISSP, or ITIL is preferred. - US Citizenship Required REQUIRED SKILLS: - The successful candidate will have a track record of success in architecting and selling high visibility, complex, technical programs and have the following skills. - Experience with large scale application modernization efforts. - Experience architecting, transitioning, and developing and maintaining large-scale software applications. - Experience with IT technologies such as: microservices architecture, containerization, cloud application development, continuous integration, continuous delivery, scaled agile development, DevOps, DevSecOps, cybersecurity, and end-user services. - Detailed knowledge of the IT industry, including key technologies, vendors, trends and an understanding of the surrounding strategic issues that may impact potential customers. - Capable of synthesizing a reference architecture from a requirements specification, industry best practices, and vendor whitepapers / artifacts. - Experienced in responding to request for proposals (RFP) and request for information (RFI). - Excellent presentation, written, and verbal communication skills for the technical and non- technical audience at both the engineering and senior executive levels. - Proven leadership traits to include team leadership, sound business judgment, ability to think and advance strategic concepts, and a professional demeanor under pressure. - The ability and willingness to travel both domestically and internationally (as needed) is required. DESIRED EXPERIENCE: - Experience in product management and commercial best practices. - Experience with managing 3rd party technology partners, vendor and subcontractor relationships. - Experience in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, or Block Chain integration. SECURITY CLEARANCE: US Citizen Must have the ability to obtain a SECRET Security Clearance SAIC Overview:SAIC is a premier technology integrator providing full life cycle services and solutions in the technical, engineering, intelligence, and enterprise information technology markets. SAIC is Redefining Ingenuity through its deep customer and domain knowledge to enable the delivery of systems engineering and integration offerings for large, complex projects. SAIC's approximately 15,000 employees are driven by integrity and mission focus to serve customers in the U.S. federal government. Headquartered in Reston, Virginia, SAIC has annual revenues of approximately $4.5 billion. For more information, visit saic.com. For information on the benefits SAIC offers, see My SAIC Benefits. EOE AA M/F/Vet/Disability Job Posting: Jul 27, 2018, 2:28:06 PM Primary Location: United States-VA-RESTON Clearance Level Must Currently Possess: None Clearance Level Must Be Able to Obtain: Secret Potential for Teleworking: Yes Travel: Yes, 25% of the time Shift: Day Job Schedule: Full-time Other Locations : United States-NY-FLEXWORK, United States-GA-FLEXWORK, United States-TX-FLEXWORK, United States-NJ-FLEXWORK, United States-FL-FLEXWORK, United States-VA-FLEXWORK, United States-PA-FLEXWORK, United States-DC-FLEXWORK, United States-MD-FLEXWORK, United States-CT-FLEXWORK, United States-NC-FLEXWORK, United States-OH-FLEXWORK, United States-TN-FLEXWORK - provided by Dice

Agile, Architecture, Artificial Intelligence, CISSP, Development, Lifecycle, Management, PMP, Sales, SDLC, Security, Specification

items.content:
Gravitational (YS S15) | Devops, Solutions Engineer | Toronto, Oakland | ONSITE REMOTE https://gravitational.com

Gravitational, systems & cloud startup in Oakland and Toronto, is looking for ambitious and talented people. We are well-funded by fantastic Silicon Valley investors. We are an experienced team: we founded Mailgun[1] which was acquired by Rackspace, we created Vulcand[2] and some other cool stuff at Rackspace and are authors of Teleport[3], Telekube[4] and Teleconsole[5]

  * Solutions Engineer (Terraform, Linux, Kubernetes, Go, Ansible)
We are looking for an experienced systems engineer who can code and can focus on our customers success - making sure our products solve their problems well. This job involves a lot of customer interactions, support, coding in Go, devops and systems engineering.

Locations: Toronto, Oakland, Remote

Details: https://gravitational.com/careers/solutions-engineer/

Contact: jobs@gravitational.com

[1] https://www.mailgun.com

[2] https://github.com/vulcand/vulcand

[3] https://github.com/gravitational/teleport

[4] https://gravitational.com/telekube

[5] https://www.teleconsole.com/

items.title: Ping Federate/PingFederate Solution Architect-Remote-Identity and Acce
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=8, c=0, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=2}
items.content:
Identity and Access Management/IAM Solution Architect candidates will have experience with Ping Federate/PingFederate. Candidates will ideally come from a software development background. We will entertain candidates from either end user or service provider backgrounds. This role is remote with travel so candidates can be based anywhere in the US.

Location - Virtual-Remote-Telecommute - 35% national travel

Starting salary $120,000 to $145,000+ per year, Also part of the comp package are full time health benefits along with significant career progression opportunity.

This is a permanent position working for a leading Cyber Security Solution provider servicing large enterprise organizations and US Government agencies.

In this Identity and Access Management Solution Architect position you will be the primary customer interface and technical authority with regard to IAM products and solutions.

Duties and Responsibilities

-Provides technical design and consulting services on (IAM) Identity and Access Management (IAM) products
-Provides customer specific though leadership and solution construction including installations of Identity and Access Management (IAM) products for User life cycle management, Identity and Access Governance, Automated Provisioning, (SSO) Single Sign-On, Federation, and Privileged Account Management
-Enhances existing systems by analysing business objectives, preparing an action plan and identifying areas for modification and improvement
-Creates customer level documentation specific to deployment of IAM products
-Creates knowledge articles for corporate website related to IAM
-Provide regular feedback to the Professional Services Director to guide systems integration methodology and packages service development

Technical Experience and Qualifications

-Experience with Ping Federate/PingFederate
-Lead customer-focused discussions and interact with our customers as the primary technical authority for an engagement
-Ability to present project solutions to clients, manage client expectations, and implement and deliver solutions
-Become a subject matter expert with IAM products and concepts
-Web Application security
-Software Security
-HTTP and related technologies
-Database/Directory integration
-x509 Certificates
-Windows, Unix, Linux
-Plusses include experience with IAM products: Radiant Logic, Sailpoint, Centrify, ForgeRock, Ping Identity, IBM, Okta, Oracle, RSA, simeio
-Federated Identity and Single Sign-On
-Access Management and API Gateways
-SAML, WS-Federation, OAuth, OpenID Connect, and/or SCIM standards
-RADIUS and/or KERBEROS
-APIs (SOAP, XML, REST, JSON)
-Social APIs including Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.
-User Directory (Active Directory OpenLDAP, OpenDJ, etc.)
-Java and/or .NET development
-Amazon's AWS services (ie VPCs, SES, RC2, R3, Route 53, Cloud Formation, etc.)

items.title: Lösungsarchitekt - Solution Architect at Platform.sh
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=8, gamedev=0, php=66, embedded=0, frontend=0}
items.content:
Lösungsarchitekt - Solution Architect

About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Mid-Level, Senior, Manager
Industry: Cloud-Based Solutions, Continuous Delivery, PaaS
Company size: 51-200 people
Company type: VC Funded
Company: Platform.sh | No office location

Technologies

cloud
linux
symfony
drupal
amazon-web-services

Job description

Unsere Kunden brauchen Onboarding und Training, bevor sie den Platform.sh-Spaß meistern können. Können Sie atemberaubende und aufregende Tech-Demos liefern und die Feinheiten der Kommandozeilen-Tools erklären? Wir betreiben OEM PaaS-Services für bekannte Marken wie Magento Enterprise Cloud Edition und Sensio Cloud - können Sie uns helfen, diese dynamischen Softwareprodukte zu entwickeln und zu betreiben?

Sie berichten direkt an unseren Director of Customer Solutions und sind in enger Zusammenarbeit mit unseren Teams für Vertrieb, Support, Engineering und Infrastruktur verantwortlich für den Verkauf und die proaktive Sicherstellung eines stabilen und sicheren Produkterlebnisses:

  • Anpassung des Produkts an die Anforderungen der potenzielle Kunden
  • Enge Zusammenarbeit mit Vertriebsteams für Produktdemos und Beantwortung technischer Fragen
  • Eingliederung und Bildung von Neukunden
  • Demonstration des Geschäftswissens unserer Kunden im Hinblick auf unsere Produktnutzung
  • Analyse der technischen Bedürfnisse der Kunden, um Beratungsleistungen vorzuschlagen und deren Anforderungen zu erfüllen.
  • Unterstützung unserer Großkunden bei der täglichen Nutzung unserer Produkte
  • Zusammenarbeit mit den Entwicklungsteams, wenn dies für die Produktverbesserung erforderlich ist.
  • sich regelmäßig mit unseren neuen Produktfeatures vertraut zu machen

Sie geben unseren Kunden einen ersten Eindruck von unserem Produkt und führen den Weg zu hoher Zufriedenheit in ihrer Produkterfahrung.

Was wir suchen

  • Nachgewiesene erfolgreiche Erfahrung im Umgang mit technischen Kundenbeziehungen in der Web-Branche
  • Nachweis der Fähigkeit, Kundenerwartungen erfolgreich mit der Produktkapazität abzugleichen
  • Umfangreiches Wissen über Architektur und Dienste von Webanwendungen (DNS, CDN, Webserver, Datenbanken, Cache-Layer usw.) und verteilte Systeme.
  • Umfangreiche Kenntnisse von Web-Entwicklungs-Workflows und vorhandenen Tools (Git, CI-Tools)
  • Kenntnisse gängiger Webanwendungen und Frameworks: Magento Ecommerce, Symfony, Drupal, eZ Platform oder Typo3 (viele unserer Kunden betreiben diese)
  • Kenntnisse über Cloud-Dienste (AWS, Azure)
  • Dynamik mit einem kühler Kopf
  • Ausgezeichnete Kommunikationsfähigkeiten mit Englischkenntnissen und deutsche als Muttersprache.

Schön zu haben :

  • Mad Linux (Debian) skillz
  • Öffentliches Reden Erfahrung
Apply now

About Platform.sh

Wir sind ein Risikokapital finanziertes, preisgekröntes Team von Hardcore-Hackern, die die Art und Weise revolutionieren möchten, wie Entwickler und Agenturen Webanwendungen erstellen und bereitstellen. Wir sind meistens verteilt, aber wir treffen uns täglich im Cyberspace und gelegentlich in Paris, Frankreich. Wir schätzen Begeisterung, Teamgeist und den ständigen Wunsch, das persönliche Wissen zu erweitern und einen Beitrag für die Gemeinschaft zu leisten. Wir bieten eine multikulturelle, lockere und ausgeglichene Arbeitsumgebung. Kürzlich haben wir der Einführung der Magento Enterprise Cloud Edition und der Sensio Cloud im/mit Platform.sh-Technologie mitgeholfen.

Zu unsere Kunden zählen unter anderem Vivienne Westwood, der britische Modehändler Reiss, die Canadian Football League, der British Council, der Parc Asterix, Seloger.com, das deutsche Start-up Flixbus oder das südamerikanische El Universo.

Benefits

  • Work from home, wherever you are
  • Safe and friendly working environment
  • Stock options for everyone
  • Rest and recovery are essential to health and happiness; we get that

items.title: Solutions Architect - NLP and Machine Learning at Critical Mix (Perrysburg, OH)
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=4, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=0, go=6, nodejs=1, bigdata-ml=38, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=5, embedded=0, frontend=33}
items.content:
Solutions Architect - NLP and Machine Learning

About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Manager
Industry: Integrated Marketing Solutions
Company size: 51-200 people
Company type: Private
Company: Critical Mix | Perrysburg, OH

Remote details

Office Location: Perrysburg, OH. Employees can also work full time from this office.

Technologies

reactjs
go
python
watson-conversation
php

Job description

   Critical Mix is looking for a Solutions Architect to work with our teams across the United States and is passionate on simplifying the complex with digital innovation.  Success in this position will require some unique knowledge in the areas of natural language processing services such as Watson and Lex as well as expertise in machine learning technologies. Of course, none of this really functions without an exceptional and intuitive BOT interface for the end user.

Responsibilities:

  • Take technical lead on the team in the ML/NLP domain and keep up with latest industry solutions.
  • Design, develop, validate and deploy proposed ML/NLP solutions both internal and client facing.
  • Innovate and build new features for our products including chatbots and virtual assistants.
  • Coaching and mentoring a team of diverse and talented software engineers.
  • Interfacing with senior management and stakeholders to define requirements and take the lead on operational and technical projects in a fast-paced environment.

Requirements

  • Advanced degree Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or related area 
  • 3+ Years of experience building software products as an Architect
  • 1+ years ML/NLP domain experience.
  • Experience with Python or Go programming languages
  • Knowledge of JavaScript frameworks like ReactJS, React Native, AngularJS
  • Experience with Microservices and Resftul API’s
  • Familiarity with a major machine learning/deep learning frameworks a plus (Keras, Tensorflow, Torch, Spark-ML)
Apply now

About Critical Mix

Critical Mix provides easy access to highly-targeted global survey respondents, survey programming and data visualization services for market research and consulting firms. Driven by a passion for simplifying data collection, the team at Critical Mix is personally invested in giving clients the ultimate customer service experience.

Benefits

  • Health benefits
  • Flexible schedule
  • Great work/life integration
  • Empowerment
  • Unlimited vacation policy
  • Competitive compensation
  • Remote location
  • Gym memberships

items.title: Solution Engineer (ID: PRSE01) at Open-Xchange GmbH (Nürnberg, Deutschland)
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=8, mobile=0, go=3, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=8, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=0}
items.content:
Solution Engineer (ID: PRSE01)

About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Mid-Level, Senior
Role: System Administrator
Industry: Collaboration Tools, Computer Software, Open-Source
Company size: 201-500 people
Company type: VC Funded
Company: Open-Xchange GmbH | Nürnberg, Deutschland

Remote details

Office Location: Nürnberg, Deutschland. Employees can also work full time from this office.

Technologies

powerdns
dns
linux

Job description

Don’t just go to work. Thrive.
Here are people committed to openness, a rebellious business spirit and they have the will to revolutionize the market.

We are eMail
Worldwide companies like: 1&1, STRATO, Host Europe, NetCologne, network solutions / web.com and Rackspace use our "white label" products for eMail and collaboration.

Open people for an open source!
Join the force which works on products to support people in their daily digital life without sacrificing their personal freedom and protect their data.

Daily activities alternate between working on customer issues and actual "Professional Services for customer implementations (both on & off-site). As a Solutions Engineer (with a focus on PowerDNS) you will work closely with the PowerDNS development team, as well as other parts of Open-Xchange and Dovecot development, sales and Product Management teams form within the European Service team.

We think Support & Implementation is a great step into a promising career. We are specifically looking for employees willing to learn quickly while delivering great support and service. Keeping an eye towards growing within the Global Services department or into different roles in the larger Open-Xchange organisation. In other words, this position is a great opportunity for your personal development. There will be a close and intimate cooperation between PowerDNS and OX Professional Services regarding the  support, implementation and development roles.

Your passion / Your job

  • Implementation & Support of PowerDNS technology for our customers
  • Investigate and reproduce complex custom issues, test solutions, help implement fixes
  • Providing technical support during complex deployment projects and roll-outs
  • Evaluation of customer environment, creation of custom integration concepts, and writing SOWs for actual implementations.
  • Customer communication and managing (technical) relationship
  • Work closely with PowerDNS (including Open-Xchange and Dovecot) development, sales, and product management teams
  • Manage architecture, design and documentation for customer solutions & projects
  • Hands on training of customer’s administrators and support team

What do you bring to the table

  • Good knowledge of DNS technologies and solutions (Open source and commercial).
  • Knowledge and experience with PowerDNS is a bonus
  • Experience in system administration or support of Unix or Linux systems, ideally in the hosting/telco market.
  • In-depth knowledge of and demonstrated experience with Linux systems
  • Experience with System architecture and design (design and analysis of complex setups in heterogeneous environments). 
  • Good understanding of large, complex networking environments (IP, Anycast, Telco mobile and broadband networks, etc.)
  • Hands-on experience with Ansible, cloud technologies and databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis and sqlite)
  • Knowledge of Lua script and/or C++ is a bonus.
  • Ability to work independently
  • Ability to travel international
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English
  • multi-lingual candidates (in German, Dutch, French, Spanish or Italian) will get bonus points
  • Experience with mission critical systems
  • knowledge of large scale E-Mail systems is a bonus 

What do we offer

  • Training and personal development
  • Home Office and the opportunity to work from one of the many offices we define as the OX world
  • The latest in IT equipment
  • Flat hierarchies combined with "Open Door" policies
  • Personal development in a dynamic environment

Apply now

About Open-Xchange GmbH

Open-Xchange / Open people for Open source

With some 250+ employees Open-Xchange develops a Open-Source-Software addressing communication, collaboration and office-productivity worldwide. Sales are made through Internet service providers, hosting, telecommunication and cable providers, which offer their customers the Open-Xchange solution as SaaS (Software as a Service). More than 200 million users adopted Open-Xchange software for their private and business communications via partners such as 1 & 1, STRATO, Host Europe, NetCologne, network solutions / web.com and Rackspace.

The core offer is named OX App Suite with applications for processing e-mails, contacts and appointments, which can be extended by functions like: OX Drive for managing and synchronizing documents, images, photos and movies; OX Documents for text processing, spreadsheets and presentations and OX Guard for encrypting emails and files. Software from Dovecot and PowerDNS are complementing Open-Xchange's portfolio.

We want to constantly advance and are looking for people who have fun working with the latest technologies in an international team. There are locations in Hamburg, Bremen, Dortmund, Cologne, Olpe and Nuremberg as well as Finland, France, the Netherlands, Italy and Spain. International offices are in Tokyo, Sydney and Palo Alto which represents the distributed team in the USA.

If you are interested, please contact Jochen F. Schude for further information - or send us your paperless application with a cover letter including the job ID, tabular CV, certificates, salary request and the earliest possible date of entry by e-mail to recruiting at open-xchange.com.

Benefits

  • Homeoffice
  • Flache Hierarchien
  • Flexible Arbeitszeiten
  • Modernste Technik
  • Work-Live-Balance
  • Culture-Mixed

items.title: Java Solution Engineer (m/w) für Software-Entwicklungsprojekte at SEVEN PRINCIPLES AG (Hamburg, Deutschland)
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=17, go=0, nodejs=15, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=2, java=101, gamedev=2, php=8, embedded=0, frontend=41}
items.content:
Java Solution Engineer (m/w) für Software-Entwicklungsprojekte

About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Mid-Level, Senior
Role: Frontend Developer
Industry: Automotive, Telecommunications, Travel, Transport & Logistics
Company size: 501-1k people
Company type: Private
Company: SEVEN PRINCIPLES AG | Hamburg, Deutschland

Remote details

Office Location: Hamburg, Deutschland. Employees can also work full time from this office.

Technologies

java
java-ee
spring
rest
javascript

Job description

Deine Aufgaben:

  • Realisierung moderner Software Lösungen, insbesondere im Rahmen von Gewerken
  • Implementierung zukunftsfähiger Unternehmens-Anwendungen für das Web und innovativer Enterprise Mobility Lösungen für Smartphones und Tablets
  • Teilnahme an projektbezogenen Besprechungen und Workshops mit Fach- und IT-Abteilungen unserer Kunden
  • technische Unterstützung bei der Angebotserstellung
  • Requierements Engineering, Software-Entwurf, Software-Architektur
  • Inbetriebnahme und Qualitätssicherung
  • Einhaltung von abgestimmten Entwicklungsaufwänden

Dein Profil:   

  • abgeschlossenes Hochschulstudium im Bereich (Wirtschafts-) Informatik oder vergleichbar
  • praktische Erfahrungen in Software-Entwicklungsprojekten
  • Erfahrungen mit Java Frameworks und Technologien wie Spring oder Java EE
  • Kenntnisse über aktuelle Web-Technologien wie JavaScript, XML, HTML5, CSS3, jQuery
  • Kenntnisse im Bereich Unified Modelling Language, serviceorientierte Architekturen, Security
  • Erfahrungen mit Libraries bspw. Bootstrap, Sass, Node.js
  • idealerweise Erfahrungen mit mobilen Anwendungen unter iOS/Android
  • Erfahrungen mit Web-Services mit SOAP oder REST
  • JBoss Application Server, Apache Tomcat
  • Erfahrungen in der datenbankbasierten Java Web-Entwicklung wie Hibernate, JSP, JSF
  • Kenntnisse im Bereich Mobile Framework, wie PhoneGap, Appcelerator, Titanium, o.ä.
  • Kenntnisse im Bereich GUI-Design und Usability
  • Erfahrungen mit Portal Frameworks und CMS: Hippo CMS, Magento, Typo3, Adobe AEM
  • teamorientierte Arbeitsweise
  • Fähigkeit zur Selbstorganisation und eine zielgerichtete und selbstständige Projektmitarbeit

Interessiert?

Wir freuen uns auf Deine Bewerbung. Bitte sende Deine vollständigen Bewerbungsunterlagen unter Angabe der Jobnummer 7P047SO, des möglichen Eintrittstermins und Deiner Gehaltsvorstellung per E-Mail an personal@7p-group.com oder nutze den "Apply Now"-Button.

Apply now

About SEVEN PRINCIPLES AG

So verstehen wir uns:

Enabling

Wir begleiten unsere Kunden entlang der Wertschöpfungskette passgenau ins digitale Zeitalter.

Your

Wir verstehen unsere Kunden und machen ihre Werte zu unseren. Unsere 7 Prinzipien spiegeln das wider.

Digital

Digitalisierung steht bei uns für Innovation. Partnerschaften wie mit dem DFKI operationalisieren den ständigen Austausch mit neuesten Technologien.

Business

Durch einen starken Branchenfokus verfügen wir über spezifisches Know-How und kennen die üblichen Prozesse, Abkürzungen & Geschäftsmodelle.

So verstehen wir digitalen Vorsprung:

  • Experte für Mobility und die digitale Transformation
  • Fokus auf Consulting, Softwareentwicklung und Managed Services
  • Flächendeckende Verteilung in 10 Städten in ganz Deutschland
  • 500 Experten mit zahlreichen Qualifizierungen
  • Zertifizierung nach ISO 9001-2015 & ISO 27001

So verstehen wir DICH:

 Bisher noch gar nicht – melde dich bei uns, um das zu ändern!

Benefits

  • Neueste Laptops und Smartphones
  • Mobiles Arbeiten und flexible Arbeitszeiten
  • Gute Anbindung, individuelle Bahncardoptionen, Firmenwagen
  • Getränkeflatrate
  • Mitarbeiterevents, Come Together & Hackathons
  • Coaching & Mentoring
  • Betriebl. Altersvorsorge
  • Regelmäßige Weiterbildungen durch die 7P Academy
  • Standortbezogene Sportangebote & JobRad
  • Individuelle Auszeit vom Job

items.title: Architecte Solutions at CAPGEMINI FRANCE (Paris, France)
tags: DBG:surround``OR(locat, base, resid) 3W OR(berlin, london, pari)
DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=1, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=15, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=8, frontend=0}
items.content:
Architecte Solutions

About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Senior, Lead, Manager
Industry: Automation, IT Consulting, Technology Consulting
Company size: 10k+ people
Company type: Private
Company: CAPGEMINI FRANCE | Paris, France

Remote details

Office Location: Paris, France. Employees can also work full time from this office.

Technologies

java
jee
esb
mom
soa

Job description

En pleine transformation digitale, les grands comptes du secteur Banque & Assurance font appel à l'entité FS SBU (Financial Services Strategic Business Unit) du groupe Capgemini. A Paris, Nantes ou Montpellier, les 1 300 talents de la FS s'appliquent à imaginer et réaliser des solutions novatrices, adaptées aux nouveaux enjeux de demain.

En tant qu'Architecte Solution H/F, vous avez participé à des projets de transformation. Outre votre connaissance des techniques et méthodologies, cela vous a permis de développer vos aptitudes relationnelles et votre leadership. Chez Capgemini, vous accompagnez les projets de nos clients en travaillant avec des interlocuteurs variés.

Vos missions :

- Accompagner les projets dans leurs différentes phases
- Participer au recueil des besoins et problématiques métiers et techniques
- Concevoir des solutions qui répondent aux exigences de performance, de robustesse, d'exploitabilité et de sécurité
- Définir et porter les architectures applicatives et techniques en assurant la traçabilité et la justification des choix
- Participer ou piloter la conception détaillée, la réalisation des solutions
- Avoir un rôle d'expert technique pour valider la faisabilité des projets
- Contribuer aux actions d'avant-vente
- Participer au développement de le la communauté des architectes Capgemini
- Faire progresser le positionnement et la reconnaissance technologique de Capgemini en tant qu'acteur majeur de la transformation Digitale des entreprises.
- Apporter votre valeur dans l'amélioration des outils et méthodes Capgemini
- Suivre et coacher des architectes juniors afin de garantir la qualité de notre delivery et de les épauler dans leur évolution professionnelle.

Diplômé d'un BAC+5 (Ecole d'ingénieur, Master 2 Système d'Information), vous maîtrisez les principales technologies et approches de l'architecture de SI (ESB, MOM, SOA, REST) ainsi que les problématiques associées (organisation dont agilité, devOps). Vous avez une expérience des solutions innovantes (microservices, RPA, IA, APIzation, Cloud...).

Apply now

About CAPGEMINI FRANCE

Fort de 50 ans d’expérience et d’une grande expertise des différents secteurs d’activité, le groupe accompagne les entreprises et organisations dans la réalisation de leurs ambitions, de la définition de leur stratégie à la mise en œuvre de leurs opérations. Capgemini, leader mondial du conseil, des services informatiques et de la transformation numérique, a réalisé un chiffre d'affaires de 12,7 milliards d'euros en 2017.

Notre vision
Pour Capgemini, ce sont les hommes et les femmes qui donnent toute sa valeur à la technologie. L’honnêteté, l’audace, la confiance, la liberté et l’indépendance d’esprit, la solidarité, la simplicité et le plaisir sont les valeurs fortes qui façonnent la manière dont nous répondons aux besoins de nos clients. Résolument multiculturel, le Groupe compte 200 000 collaborateurs présents dans plus de 40 pays.

Benefits

  • Contexte multiculturel
  • Misions diversifiées : clients d'envergure, tous secteurs d'activité
  • Ecole de formation : réseaux d'experts, certifications, Université...
  • Accord égalité professionnelle Hommes/Femmes
  • Accord Télétravail
  • Mutuelle d'entreprise

items.title: Principal Solution Architect - Global MOM Services SME for QMS - Any U.S. City at Siemens PLM Software (New York, NY)
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=1, c=0, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=0}
items.content:
Principal Solution Architect - Global MOM Services SME for QMS - Any U.S. City

About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Mid-Level, Senior
Industry: Computer Software, Information Services, Project Management
Company size: 10k+ people
Company type: Public
Company: Siemens PLM Software | New York, NY

Remote details

Office Location: New York, NY. Employees can also work full time from this office.

Technologies

web-services
continuous-integration

Job description

Division: Digital Factory
Business Unit: Product Lifecycle Management-PLM
Requisition Number: 218871
Primary Location: United States--
Assignment Category: Full-time regular
Experience Level: Senior level
Education Required Level: Bachelor's Degree
Travel Required: 60%

Division Description:

Siemens is a global technology powerhouse that has stood for engineering excellence, innovation, quality, reliability and internationality for more than 165 years. As a global technology company, Siemens is rigorously leveraging the advantages that this setup provides. To tap business opportunities in both new and established markets, the Company is organized in nine Divisions: Power and Gas, Wind Power and Renewables, Energy Management, Building Technologies, Mobility, Digital Factory, Process Industries and Drives, Healthcare and Financial Services.

The Siemens Digital Factory Division offers a comprehensive portfolio of seamlessly integrated hardware, software and technology-based services in order to support manufacturing companies worldwide in enhancing the flexibility and efficiency of their manufacturing processes and reducing the time to market of their products.

For more information, please visit:http://www.siemens.com/businesses/us/en/digital-factory.htm



Job Description:

Position OverviewThe role is a subject matter expert as it relates to the implementation of Quality Management Systems IBS products as a part of the Manufacturing Operations Management (MOM) product portfolio.
  • He/she is expected to have a deep understanding of Manufacturing Operations Software and specifically the Siemens MOM portfolio with a deep understanding of Siemens Quality Management Systems.
  • The understanding of Quality Management Systems is intended to be around the implementation (services) of these solutions across one or more related industries/domains. 
  • The role requires a passion for helping customer achieve realized value, a vision for improving Siemen’s position in the Manufacturing Operations marketplace, a desire to increase our market share in industries that we serve, and a drive for continuously improving the processes that we use to achieve successful implementations and the willingness to travel globally.
  • This role will report directly to the Global Practice Lead for MOM Services.  This Practice sits within the Global GSM&S organization known as Digital Realization Services and will work extensively with the Zone MOM Services Delivery teams.
Responsibilities
  • Overall responsibility – This role is a Global Role related to the implementation of Quality Management Solutions.  In this role the resource will be involved in complex, strategic programs that span across Zones and will be critical in enabling capacity.
  • Support Advantedge adoption across MOM Service globally
  • Promote re-usable learning programs, knowledge transfer, and enablement
  • Provide staff enablement in support of scaling and aligning capacity
  • Provide best practices for global program pursuits and delivery
  • Support the expanded use of the GDN (MOM COE) within the zones
    • Required Knowledge/Skills, Education, and Experience
  • Minimum Bachelor’s degree
  • Minimum 3 years hands on experience implementing Quality Management solutions
  • Minimum 5 years of experience working with manufacturing-related industries
  • Minimum 5 years of experience implementing MOM solutions
  • Travel is international and is expected to be as much as 70% at times – averaging around 50%
  • Deep understanding of Quality Management Solutions with an awareness of Manufacturing Operations Management Solutions (e.g. MES, APS, Scada). 
  • Skilled with the architecture, configuration, and integration of Quality Management Solutions.
  • Experience with implementing Advanced Product and Quality Planning (APQP), Failure Mode and Effects Analysis (FMEA), First Quality Inspection (PPAP), Statistical Process Control (SPC), Customer Complaint Management (CCM) and related Quality Process Management (QPM) solutions. 
  • Experience with querying SQL Server and Oracle databases. 
  • Strong customer and inter-personal skills, excellent English verbal and written communication abilities, the proven ability to gather and apply customer requirements, and the ability to quickly diagnose and troubleshoot issues.
    • Preferred Knowledge/Skills, Education, and Experience
  • Engineering Degree preferred
  • Hands on experience in Automotive, Electronics, or Aerospace and Defense industries preferred
  • Experience integration MOM to ERP, Shopfloor Systems (OPC) and Supplier/Customer Integration preferred

    • #LI-CD1

    Apply now

    About Siemens PLM Software

    Equal Employment Opportunity Statement 
    Siemens is an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer encouraging diversity in the workplace. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their race, color, creed, religion, national origin, citizenship status, ancestry, sex, age, physical or mental disability, marital status, family responsibilities, pregnancy, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender expression, gender identity, transgender, sex stereotyping, protected veteran or military status, and other categories protected by federal, state or local law.

    EEO is the Law 
    Applicants and employees are protected under Federal law from discrimination. To learn more, Click here.

    Pay Transparency Non-Discrimination Provision 
    Siemens follows Executive Order 11246, including the Pay Transparency Nondiscrimination Provision. To learn more, Click here.

    Benefits

    • Medical, Dental, Vision, and Prescription Drugs Coverage
    • Employee Assistance Program
    • 401(k) with 6% Matching
    • PTO, 9 Paid Holidays, and two Diversity Days
    • Adoption Assistance
    • Tuition Reimbursement

items.title: PreSales Solution Architect - Web Crawling at Scrapinghub
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=20, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=0, go=3, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=8, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=0}
items.content:
PreSales Solution Architect - Web Crawling

About this job

Job type: Contract
Experience level: Mid-Level, Senior
Industry: Big Data
Company size: 51-200 people
Company type: Private
Company: Scrapinghub | No office location

Technologies

python
web-scraping
scrapy
architecture
web-crawler

Job description

Scrapinghub is looking for a motivated Solution Architect to further accelerate the rapid growth Scrapinghub has seen in the last 3+ years.

As a Solution Architect, you will be in charge of the requirement analysis phase of our Professional Services projects. You will gather the customer requirements, analyze and provide technical solutions to our customers and our internal teams for development and delivery. You will be pivotal in translating customer and technical project requirements across various internal and external teams.   

Job Responsibilities:

    • Meet with customers for requirement collection and provide technical consultation and advice.
    • Deconstruct raw business / customer  requirements and identifying the actual business problems the customer is trying to solve.
    • Translate customer requirements into a viable business solution, execute the necessary; conduct deep technical investigation, propose the best approach and solution inclusive of effort, cost estimates, and occasionally project timelines which fit the customer’s business goals and expectations.
    • Build Proof of Concepts, to showcase technical expertise in data acquisition projects, assess feasibility, refine scope, and  achieve project collaboration and engagement
    • Mentor developers to build a strong team of Solution Architects.
    • Ensure you are up-to-date on Scrapinghub products and service offerings which will enable you to provide an architectural solution that includes the latest capabilities and provide value to our customers
    • Create, write and present customer proposals and ensure it completely captures the technical requirements for the solution proposed
    • Take ownership of learning upcoming product and service capabilities by requesting training sessions from the concerned team.
    • Work with subject matter experts to provide better solutions.

About you:

    • You have solid knowledge and understanding of aspects of web crawling using Python & Scrapy.
    • You have strong client and customer facing experience - minimum of 3 years experience in a similar position within a technical environment
    • You have excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, and are comfortable in document writing, both technical and non technical
    • You possess excellent presentation skills and experience in articulating technical and business solutions to both technical and non technical audiences.
    • You have the ability to articulate and convey technical solutions effectively and clearly to internal teams and stakeholders.
    • You have the zeal to understand customer business requirements really well by asking the right questions.
    • You have the confidence to assert and justify the technical feasibility of a requirement, to make decisions, negotiate scope, and assess risk.
    • You have solid experience of mentoring teams preferably software developers.
    • You demonstrate proven knowledge and experience of estimation, planning, and project management.
    • You are well organized, self-motivated, and communicative -- an essential skill in a remote team.

Bonus points for:

    • You have experience in web crawling in any other tools.
    • A proven track record of working with a remote team
    • Knowledge of and interest in web crawling, data mining and information retrieval
Apply now

About Scrapinghub

Founded in 2010, Scrapinghub is a fast growing and diverse technology business turning web content into useful data with a cloud-based web crawling platform, off-the-shelf datasets, and turn-key web scraping services.

We’re a globally distributed team of 120 Shubbers working from over 30 countries who are passionate about scraping, web crawling, and data science.

As a new Shubber, you will:

Become part of a self-motivated, progressive, multi-cultural team.

Autonomy to make the role your own, supported by great people

Join a team with huge opportunity to make a difference

Have the freedom to work from wherever you want.

Have the opportunity to go to conferences and meet with the team from across the globe.

Get the chance to work with cutting-edge open source technologies and tools.

Benefits

  • Flexible working hours
  • Remote working
  • Paid time off
  • Paid open source work
  • Global team meet ups

items.title: Solutions Architect - GERMAN SPEAKING at Platform.sh
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=8, gamedev=0, php=66, embedded=0, frontend=0}
items.content:
Solutions Architect - GERMAN SPEAKING

About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Mid-Level, Senior, Manager
Industry: Cloud-Based Solutions, Continuous Delivery, PaaS
Company size: 51-200 people
Company type: VC Funded
Company: Platform.sh | No office location

Technologies

cloud
linux
symfony
drupal
amazon-web-services

Job description

Unsere Kunden brauchen Onboarding und Training, bevor sie den Platform.sh-Spaß meistern können. Können Sie atemberaubende und aufregende Tech-Demos liefern und die Feinheiten der Kommandozeilen-Tools erklären? Wir betreiben OEM PaaS-Services für bekannte Marken wie Magento Enterprise Cloud Edition und Sensio Cloud - können Sie uns helfen, diese dynamischen Softwareprodukte zu entwickeln und zu betreiben?

Sie berichten direkt an unseren Director of Customer Solutions und sind in enger Zusammenarbeit mit unseren Teams für Vertrieb, Support, Engineering und Infrastruktur verantwortlich für den Verkauf und die proaktive Sicherstellung eines stabilen und sicheren Produkterlebnisses:

  • Anpassung des Produkts an die Anforderungen der potenzielle Kunden
  • Enge Zusammenarbeit mit Vertriebsteams für Produktdemos und Beantwortung technischer Fragen
  • Eingliederung und Bildung von Neukunden
  • Demonstration des Geschäftswissens unserer Kunden im Hinblick auf unsere Produktnutzung
  • Analyse der technischen Bedürfnisse der Kunden, um Beratungsleistungen vorzuschlagen und deren Anforderungen zu erfüllen.
  • Unterstützung unserer Großkunden bei der täglichen Nutzung unserer Produkte
  • Zusammenarbeit mit den Entwicklungsteams, wenn dies für die Produktverbesserung erforderlich ist.
  • sich regelmäßig mit unseren neuen Produktfeatures vertraut zu machen

Sie geben unseren Kunden einen ersten Eindruck von unserem Produkt und führen den Weg zu hoher Zufriedenheit in ihrer Produkterfahrung.

Was wir suchen

  • Nachgewiesene erfolgreiche Erfahrung im Umgang mit technischen Kundenbeziehungen in der Web-Branche
  • Nachweis der Fähigkeit, Kundenerwartungen erfolgreich mit der Produktkapazität abzugleichen
  • Umfangreiches Wissen über Architektur und Dienste von Webanwendungen (DNS, CDN, Webserver, Datenbanken, Cache-Layer usw.) und verteilte Systeme.
  • Umfangreiche Kenntnisse von Web-Entwicklungs-Workflows und vorhandenen Tools (Git, CI-Tools)
  • Kenntnisse gängiger Webanwendungen und Frameworks: Magento Ecommerce, Symfony, Drupal, eZ Platform oder Typo3 (viele unserer Kunden betreiben diese)
  • Kenntnisse über Cloud-Dienste (AWS, Azure)
  • Dynamik mit einem kühler Kopf
  • Ausgezeichnete Kommunikationsfähigkeiten mit Englischkenntnissen und deutsche als Muttersprache.

Schön zu haben :

  • Mad Linux (Debian) skillz
  • Öffentliches Reden Erfahrung
Apply now

About Platform.sh

Wir sind ein Risikokapital finanziertes, preisgekröntes Team von Hardcore-Hackern, die die Art und Weise revolutionieren möchten, wie Entwickler und Agenturen Webanwendungen erstellen und bereitstellen. Wir sind meistens verteilt, aber wir treffen uns täglich im Cyberspace und gelegentlich in Paris, Frankreich. Wir schätzen Begeisterung, Teamgeist und den ständigen Wunsch, das persönliche Wissen zu erweitern und einen Beitrag für die Gemeinschaft zu leisten. Wir bieten eine multikulturelle, lockere und ausgeglichene Arbeitsumgebung. Kürzlich haben wir der Einführung der Magento Enterprise Cloud Edition und der Sensio Cloud im/mit Platform.sh-Technologie mitgeholfen.

Zu unsere Kunden zählen unter anderem Vivienne Westwood, der britische Modehändler Reiss, die Canadian Football League, der British Council, der Parc Asterix, Seloger.com, das deutsche Start-up Flixbus oder das südamerikanische El Universo.

Benefits

  • Work from home, wherever you are
  • Safe and friendly working environment
  • Stock options for everyone
  • Rest and recovery are essential to health and happiness; we get that

items.title: PHP + Laravel Engineer at High-Growth FinTech Company at Lenox Park Solutions LLC (Austin, TX)
tags: DBG:surround``2N(work, remot) 2N OR(option, allow, abl, possibl, permit)
DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=75, embedded=0, frontend=24}
items.content:
PHP + Laravel Engineer at High-Growth FinTech Company

About this job

Job type: Contract
Experience level: Junior, Mid-Level
Role: Backend Developer
Industry: Financial Technology, Investment Banking, Software Development / Engineering
Company size: 1-10 people
Company type: Private
Company: Lenox Park Solutions LLC | Austin, TX

Remote details

Office Location: Austin, TX. Employees can also work full time from this office.

Technologies

php
laravel
vue.js
ubuntu
linux

Job description

Lenox Park Solutions is seeking a PHP Engineer with 2-5 years of commercial experience. As a PHP Engineer, you would work closely with our Development team to code and test functionality which will directly increase the scalability of Roundtables, our flagship product which will disrupt and revitalize the Asset Management industry. The junior developer will work directly with an experienced Senior PHP Engineer in helping to execute platform development, and will have the opportunity to grow within the organization as LPS expands it technical team. At LPS, we focus on accountability, proactive-ness, and creative thinking. Staff members retain the option to work remotely, as we are a goals-oriented team.

  • Requirements:
    • Professional experience on PHP, specifically with Laravel, VueJS/ReactJS, and Git, and preferably with Laravel Queues, Websockets, Amazon Web Services, and Linux (Ubuntu);
    • Outstanding communication skills, both verbal and written experience with technical and non-technical audiences;
    • Ability to assess ongoing processes critically and recommend creative, thoughtful operational improvements;
  • Preferred Skills:
    • Understanding of Asset Management industry;
    • Business-oriented, highly analytical mind with a knack for accounting for both complex business and technical considerations simultaneously
Apply now

About Lenox Park Solutions LLC

Lenox Park Solutions LLC (LPS) is a FinTech firm focused on Asset Managers and Financial Institutions. Our mission is to enable the democratization of access to Institutional capital by using technology to match best-in-class Asset Allocators with the most talented Asset Managers. Our solutions will challenge entrenched traditional notions of who should be able to manage money, upending the staid model where pedigree and privilege drive capital allocation. Leveraging deep experience in investment banking and asset management, LPS licenses CRM solutions that emphasize networking and collaboration to manage Fundraising, Deal Pipeline, Business Development and Operations. LPS maintains offices in New York, NY and Austin, TX.

Benefits

  • Remote Office
  • Experienced Investment Professionals
  • Austin and New York Offices
  • Lean, Entrepreneurial Team

items.content:
Solutions Engineer


Gravitational

 verified
Gravitational, systems & cloud startup in Oakland and Toronto, is looking for ambitious and talented people. We are well-funded by fantastic Silicon Valley investors.

We are an experienced team: we founded Mailgun[1] which was acquired by Rackspace, we created Vulcand[2] and some other cool stuff at Rackspace and are authors of Teleport[3], Telekube[4] and Teleconsole[5]


We are looking for an experienced systems engineer who can code and can focus on our customers success - making sure our products solve their problems well. This job involves a lot of customer interactions, support, coding in Go, devops and systems engineering.

Remote: We are ok hiring senior remote engineer who can travel several times per year.
More info: [https://github.com/gravitational/careers/blob/master/solutions-engineer.md](https://github.com/gravitational/careers/blob/master/solutions-engineer.md)

[1] https://www.mailgun.com

[2] https://github.com/vulcand/vulcand

[3] https://github.com/gravitational/teleport

[4] https://gravitational.com/telekube

[5] https://www.teleconsole.com/

See more jobs at Gravitational

Visit Gravitational's website
